title: OpenEEW
informationFirstPara: We are a community building technology to detect the earliest signs of an earthquake and issue alerts. We provide people critical time to seek cover or exit buildings.
informationSecPara: OpenEEW is a growing project. We need volunteers to install sensors, start networks in seismically vulnerable regions, and contribute to the next generation of OpenEEW technology.
sensor_description: Our sensors are low-cost, high-quality seismometers that can deploy with ease to monitor ground motion.
dashboard_description: Our dashboard reflects detected earthquakes and allows sensor owners to manage their devices.
network_description: Our system is most valuable in densely-populated areas where large earthquakes are likely to occur.
banner_mission: A low cost, open source, IoT-based earthquake early warning system.
